{"id":278987940,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1573804562,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/278987940/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"8.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        unordered_set<int> temp;\n        \n        while(n != 1) {\n            int k = 0;\n            \n            while(n != 0) {\n                k += pow(n % 10, 2);\n                n /= 10;\n            }\n            \n            if(temp.find(k) != temp.end()) {\n                return false;\n            }\n            temp.insert(k);\n            \n            n = k;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
